creator: robert.flaherty@oracle.com
text:
This would be very helpful when looking up the defaults.  Currently in some tasks they're listed in the Description column, others the Required column, and yet others not at all.

I don't know how many people are actively working on Ant, and releases have slowed over recent years, but I'd volunteer to help edit some of the files.
I agree it would improve the documentation but am afraid it is no small task. So if you want to help out, that would be great :-)
creator: bodewig@apache.org
